shared_text:
New Hope Fellowship
July 21 at 3:42 PM ·

We are excited to provide this service to our community every Friday!

Maple Grove Elementary School: 10-10:45
House Springs Elementary: 11:15-12:30
High Ridge Elementary School: 1:00-2:30

There are no requirements. Just drive up and tell us how many kids you have and we will load the meals into your trunk. Every child will get 14 meals (7 breakfasts and 7 lunches) worth of food!

The menu may vary, but on a typical week, you will get oatmeal or cereal for each day, apples or apple sauce and oranges, a few PB&J sandwiches, string cheese, peanuts, goldfish crackers, and a full gallon of milk.

This Friday, as well as 8/7 and 8/21, there will also be a produce box for each family.

Pickup must be made by parent or guardian.

While schools are closed, Northwest will continue to provide meals for children 18 and younger at no cost. Meals will be distributed in a "Grab and Go" style. All following weeks, will be Wednesdays ONLY. Students will receive five breakfasts and five lunches to last the week.

VMS—11 a.m.- noon (A-L) and noon -1 p.m. (M-Z)

If you have already signed up through the form on the Coronavirus Information Page on our website, you do not need to do so again.
